ChessGameKenai
Class Packet

java.lang.Object
  ChessGameKenai.Packet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The Packet class is a serialized object that we use to communicate with the client and the server we simply set needed instance variables and then we extract them on the other side This class is solely for communication purposes over network as serialized objects

See Also:
Serializable, Serialized Form
